bibl.title: Drinking-Goblets and Table Amphorae. Groups of Ptolemaic Painted Pottery.
bibl.note: Pottery in the collections of the British Museum. - Sherds and vessels of painted pottery. - Decorated goblets of Benaki shape. - Catalogue of British Museum material [Nos 1-48]. - The Hera sanctuary at Naukratis. - Conclusions. - Pp. 86-88: Appendix. Loukas Benaki's letters mentioning the pottery he gave to the Museum.
bibl.seg: Donald M. Bailey, Drinking-Goblets and Table Amphorae. Groups of Ptolemaic Painted Pottery.
Cahiers de la céramique égyptienne 9 (2011) pp. 71-93, 4 pll.

Pottery in the collections of the British Museum. - Sherds and vessels of painted pottery. - Decorated goblets of Benaki shape. - Catalogue of British Museum material [Nos 1-48]. - The Hera sanctuary at Naukratis. - Conclusions. - Pp. 86-88: Appendix. Loukas Benaki's letters mentioning the pottery he gave to the Museum.
